name: Chess Dungeons: Shubousha
description:
This time around, Chess Dungeons is set in beautiful japanese landscapes!
Enjoy 360-degree control over the board to not only visualize the beautiful scenery and character models,
but also choose your preferred method of playing the game!


Some puzzles have a larger number of pieces than traditional chess.



In this game mode, only one thing matters: slay your opponent's King.
You can still attack other pieces, but success is only achieved by knocking out the enemy King.


Instead of slaying the king, this time you have to wipe out all enemy pieces!
Pawns, rooks, bishops, knights, queens and kings all should be eliminated!
